definition: the bride's side (of a wedding)/of the bride's party

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The best position for beginners is with the receiver lying on his back with the giver lying on the stomach along side.
sentences.chinese: 初學者的最佳體位是女方仰臥而男方趴在旁邊。

sentences.english: However, the fathers of many bridegrooms still require it.
sentences.chinese: 可是，許多新郎的父親仍然要求女方有陪嫁。

sentences.english: One of the couple planning to get married must be our registered parishioner who attends our church regularly.
sentences.chinese: 預備結婚的男方或女方必須爲本堂已註冊的熱心教友。

sentences.english: He and the mother have discussed everything and are on very friendly terms.
sentences.chinese: 他和女方已經談好了各方面細節，並且兩人關係很好。

sentences.english: Girl wants the guy to like her, agrees to his pick.
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓男方喜歡她，女方會同意男方的選擇。

sentences.english: The woman is registered city alone, a daughter, family circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 女方是城市戶口，獨養女兒，家境好。

sentences.english: Now James and Aggy have set tongues wagging once again, after they were spied hanging out in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 日前，他們相約出遊，由女方開車在洛杉磯逛大街。

sentences.english: But, kiss many times, disrelish him because of the woman short and fail.
sentences.chinese: 可是，相了好幾次親，都因爲女方嫌他矮而告吹。

sentences.english: Guy wants to impress the girl, agrees to her pick.
sentences.chinese: 爲了給女方留下一個好印象，男方會同意女方的選擇。

sentences.english: Guy wants to impress the girl, agrees to her pick.
sentences.chinese: 爲了給女方留下一個好印象，男方會同意女方的選擇。

sentences.english: Those who received the bridal cakes, were expected to present congratulatory gifts to the girl's parents.
sentences.chinese: 女方父母指望那些收到老婆餅的人會給賀禮。

sentences.english: And in general, wives who had lived with their partners prior to marriage were generally more verbally aggressive than those in couples with no premarital cohabitation.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，婚前同居過的女方在言詞上更具侵略性。

definition: the bridegroom's side/of the bridegroom's family
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
